Here's Why Today's U.S. Election Matters for Cryptohttps://www.coindesk.com/news-analysis/2024/11/05/crypto-regulation-2024-election-impact/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines DTH2GQZEVBKXPVEVB5JXAAIGU Nikhilesh DeIt is Election Day in the U.S. At some point in the coming hours, days and weeks, we'll know which major party wins control of the House of Representatives, the Senate and the White House. Presidential candidates Kamala Harris and Donald Trump might get most of the headlines, but which political party controls Congress probably means a lot in terms of how cryptocurrencies will be treated in the nation, especially in the short term.
